Title: Makes the following participating agencies for purposes of agency assisted voter registration: public libraries, local housing authorities, and public high schools
Summary: Makes the following participating agencies for purposes of agency assisted voter registration: public libraries, local housing authorities, and public high schools; directs the state board of elections to promulgate rules and regulations for implementation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to designating additional participating agencies for purposes of agency assisted voter registration
